message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with the problem of person search in images, which involves both computer vision and machine learning techniques. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper proposes a neural search mechanism that recursively shrinks the search area, which involves the use of neural networks and deep learning techniques, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) likely sub-categories as well. The paper also evaluates its method on two benchmark datasets, which involves performance evaluation and metrics, making cs.MM (Multimedia) a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper involves information retrieval techniques, as it aims to retrieve a specific person from an image, making cs.IR (Information Retrieval) a possible sub-category as well.
